TopicTitle: Add ability to set colors via RGB and/or hex codes

Articles.Content: This would be for advanced users, but the ability to set part, suit, and flag colors via RGB and/or hex values would be immensely useful.

I’d like to have the ability to have custom flags in single player games - so I can use my flag I’ve used for 12 years! 

58 minutes ago, Angelo Kerman said:

This would be for advanced users, but the ability to set part, suit, and flag colors via RGB and/or hex values would be immensely useful.

Two major features added here: RGB values (inspired by the lights part manager) and a color picker (VERY important feature in my opinion, to pick a color on the rocket)
